results.title: Misconfigured Strict-Transport-Security Header
results.description: The Strict-Transport-Security header is present but may not be optimally configured. Enforces HTTPS connections
results.short_description: The Strict-Transport-Security header is present but may not be optimally configured. Enforces HTTPS connections
results.remediation: Update the Strict-Transport-Security header to: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains; preload
results.countermeasures: Update the Strict-Transport-Security header to: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains; preload

results.title: Misconfigured X-XSS-Protection Header
results.description: The X-XSS-Protection header is present but may not be optimally configured. Legacy header; prefer CSP instead. Some browsers ignore this.
results.short_description: The X-XSS-Protection header is present but may not be optimally configured. Legacy header; prefer CSP instead. Some browsers ignore this.
results.remediation: Update the X-XSS-Protection header to: 1; mode=block
results.countermeasures: Update the X-XSS-Protection header to: 1; mode=block

results.title: Misconfigured Content-Security-Policy Header
results.description: The Content-Security-Policy header is present but may not be optimally configured. Controls resource loading
results.short_description: The Content-Security-Policy header is present but may not be optimally configured. Controls resource loading
results.remediation: Update the Content-Security-Policy header to: default-src 'self'
results.countermeasures: Update the Content-Security-Policy header to: default-src 'self'

results.title: Missing Referrer-Policy Header
results.description: The Referrer-Policy header is missing. Controls referrer information
results.short_description: The Referrer-Policy header is missing. Controls referrer information
results.remediation: Add the Referrer-Policy header with value: strict-origin-when-cross-origin
results.countermeasures: Add the Referrer-Policy header with value: strict-origin-when-cross-origin

results.title: Missing Permissions-Policy Header
results.description: The Permissions-Policy header is missing. Controls browser features
results.short_description: The Permissions-Policy header is missing. Controls browser features
results.remediation: Add the Permissions-Policy header with value: geolocation=(), microphone=(), camera=()
results.countermeasures: Add the Permissions-Policy header with value: geolocation=(), microphone=(), camera=()

results.title: Misconfigured Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy Header
results.description: The Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy header is present but may not be optimally configured. Helps isolate browsing context (COOP)
results.short_description: The Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy header is present but may not be optimally configured. Helps isolate browsing context (COOP)
results.remediation: Update the Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy header to: same-origin
results.countermeasures: Update the Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy header to: same-origin

results.title: Misconfigured Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy Header
results.description: The Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy header is present but may not be optimally configured. Requires cross-origin resources to grant permission (COEP)
results.short_description: The Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy header is present but may not be optimally configured. Requires cross-origin resources to grant permission
results.remediation: Update the Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy header to: require-corp
results.countermeasures: Update the Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy header to: require-corp

results.title: Missing Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy Header
results.description: The Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy header is missing. Controls cross-origin resource sharing (CORP)
results.short_description: The Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy header is missing. Controls cross-origin resource sharing (CORP)
results.remediation: Add the Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy header with value: same-origin
results.countermeasures: Add the Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy header with value: same-origin

results.title: Missing X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies Header
results.description: The X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies header is missing. Prevents Adobe cross-domain policy abuse
results.short_description: The X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies header is missing. Prevents Adobe cross-domain policy abuse
results.remediation: Add the X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies header with value: none
results.countermeasures: Add the X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies header with value: none

results.title: Missing Security Header: Referrer-Policy
results.description: Referrer-Policy header missing
results.short_description: Referrer-Policy header missing
results.remediation: Implement the Referrer-Policy header to enhance security.
results.countermeasures: Implement the Referrer-Policy header to enhance security.

results.title: Server Information Disclosure
results.description: Server header reveals information: cloudflare tsa_p
results.short_description: Server header reveals information: cloudflare tsa_p
results.remediation: Remove or modify the Server header to prevent information disclosure.
results.countermeasures: Remove or modify the Server header to prevent information disclosure.

results.title: Sensitive Data Exposure
results.description: Potential Credit Card exposure detected in the response.
results.short_description: Potential Credit Card exposure detected in the response.
results.remediation: Implement proper data protection measures. Ensure sensitive data is encrypted in transit and at rest. Follow the principle of least privilege and only expose necessary data.
results.countermeasures: Implement proper data protection measures. Ensure sensitive data is encrypted in transit and at rest. Follow the principle of least privilege and only expose necessary data.

results.title: Information Disclosure
results.description: Server is revealing Server version information in response headers.
results.short_description: Server is revealing Server version information in response headers.
results.remediation: Remove or mask sensitive information from response headers. Configure the server to not expose version information or technology stack details.
results.countermeasures: Remove or mask sensitive information from response headers. Configure the server to not expose version information or technology stack details.

results.title: Technology Information
results.description: Detected technology: Node.js (version not identified).
results.short_description: Detected technology: Node.js (version not identified).
results.remediation: N/A
results.countermeasures: N/A

results.description: Detected technology: Express (version not identified).
results.short_description: Detected technology: Express (version not identified).
results.remediation: N/A
results.countermeasures: N/A
